title: Floral Diamond Pendant - Elegant Addigai Design
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with brilliant-cut Diamonds (SI Clarity
G-H Color). Features Hyderabadi Polish for exceptional shine and durability.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Addigai design, this pendant features a delicate floral motif meticulously crafted with pavé-set diamonds. The wing-like structure on either side add a modern flair, while the central floral design retains a classic South Indian aesthetic.
colors: Yellow Gold and sparkling White Diamonds.
occasions: or as an elegant addition to traditional South Indian attire for functions like Seemantham or Half-Saree Function (Langa Voni Function).
description: This pendant beautifully blends traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The brilliant-cut diamonds offer exceptional sparkle and brilliance. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, while the Hyderabadi polish guarantees a long-lasting shine. It's a timeless piece that can be cherished for generations.
